sentences.en: How do you motivate people to work hard and efficiently?
sentences.cn: 你是如何激励人们努力而高效地工作的？

sentences.en: Services could be operated more efficiently and economically.
sentences.cn: 可以更有效、更经济地提供服务。

sentences.en: The plan is designed to motivate employees to work more efficiently.
sentences.cn: 这个计划旨在促使员工更加卓有成效地工作。
